segments.text: Tell me , what do you enjoy doing in your spare time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know how to draw and paint ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When did you learn how to do that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I learned back in high school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , so you took an art class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I loved that art class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see that you're pretty talented .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish I had a talent like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sure you have a talent . It's just hidden .
segments.speaker: S2
